text.tspan: Historical Index of Human Development, 1870 to 2015
The Historical Index of Human Development (HIHD) is a summary measure of average achievement in
three key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy life, being knowledgeable and having a
Data source: Prados de la Escosura (2018)
